intro.message-part-1: A enthusiastic software developer who loves donuts and building full-stack applications while learning something new everyday.
intro.message-part-2: To build my projects, I use Typescript and Javascript as main programming technologies.

about.title: About me
about.subtitle: Web Developer & Content Creator
about.intro-1: I am a person with a desire to grow by learning new things every day. Driven by curiosity, I fell in love with web development and design.
about.intro-2: I am very interested in opportunities to work with the latest technologies on challenging projects that would push my skills to the end. I like programming and I am specially ambitious on the kind of projects that solves daily problems.

projects.title: My Projects and Works
projects.intro-part-1: (...) and because I understand that showing is sometimes better than saying, here are some of my personal projects that I have been working on these days. You can see all my personal projects on my

content.bug-tracker: Bug Tracker App built with React.JS and Typescript
content.bug-tracker-server: Bug Tracker Restfull API built with Typescript, Node.JS + Express.JS + MongoDB on the Back-end
content.url-shortner: Url Shortner App built with React.JS and Typescript
content.notes-app: Notes App made with React.JS + Styled-Components + Sass
content.tasks-app: Contacts and Tasks Application made with Javascript, React.JS and Node.JS + Express.JS + MongoDB on the Back-end
content.tasks-app-server: Server Restfull API for Contacts and Tasks App, made with Javascript, Node.JS, Express.JS and Mongo DB
content.recipes-website: Recipes Website made using Typescript, Next.JS and Node.JS + Express.JS + Mongo DB
content.hagira-store: Hagira E-commerce Website made using React.JS and Javascript
content.hagira-store-server: Server Restfull API for Hagira E-commerce Website, made with Javascript, Node.JS, Express.JS and Mongo DB
